title: Is "Report" toxic?
body:
Been chatting with some riot members and they all agree that saying that I will report x player for y reason, is toxic.
When we wanted a change in the report system, we didn't want them to do a 180 degree turn. Small steps to improve the report system is always healthier.

If the community wants some champ to have less health, the balancing team don't go from 500 to 350 in a single update. This upsets me so much.
